# Copilot Instructions

This file provides instructions for GitHub Copilot when working with this repository.

## Repository Overview

This is the `claude` repository. When contributing to this project, please follow the guidelines below.

## General Guidelines

- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Follow existing code patterns and conventions in the repository
- Include appropriate error handling
- Write meaningful commit messages
- Keep changes focused and minimal

## Code Quality

- Ensure code is well-documented with clear comments where necessary
- Follow language-specific best practices and idioms
- Write unit tests for new functionality when test infrastructure exists
- Validate changes don't break existing functionality

## Pull Requests

- Keep pull requests focused on a single concern
- Provide clear descriptions of changes
- Ensure all tests pass before submitting
- Address review feedback promptly
